item.title: Can things be avoided from getting Inherited? - The 'final' Keyword
item.description: We've seen multiple examples of how to inherit properties from parent class to the child classes using extends keyword. We've also seen examples of method overriding and why we need it. Now few questions come to mind: Is there a way to prevent classes from getting extended, is there a way to protect methods from getting overridden and why will someone ever need to do such a thing. Let's dive deep.

item.title: Code Reusability and Inheritance
item.description: In this article we'll see a story that guides us towards inheritance

item.description: We saw why one might use inheritance here. In this post we'll build on that knowledge and see more concepts relating to inheritance.
